mapper.sql: id, museum_id, fk_id, update_time, create_time, creater, updater, delete_mark
mapper.insert: insert into cultural_safe_list (id, museum_id, fk_id, update_time, create_time, creater, updater, delete_mark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{museumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cultural_safe_list
id,
museum_id,
fk_id,
update_time,
create_time,
creater,
updater,
delete_mark,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{museumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deleteMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update cultural_safe_list
museum_id = #{museumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_id = #{fkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_mark = #{deleteMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cultural_safe_list set museum_id = #{museumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_id = #{fkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_mark = #{deleteMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.museum_id as "museumId", a.fk_id as "fkId", b.att_name as "attName", b.att_path as "attPath" FROM cultural_safe_list a, mip_attachment b WHERE b.att_id=a.fk_id and a.museum_id = #{museumId} AND a.delete_mark = #{level} ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
mapper.delete: delete from cultural_safe_list where museum_id=#{museumId} and delete_mark=#{flag}
